vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to and an expansion of Planned Development District No. 490 for a private school on property zoned Planned Development District No. 490 and an R-7.5(A) Single Family District, on the southeast corner of Ferguson Road and Peavy Road
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised development plan, revised landscape plan, a revised traffic management plan, and revised conditions
Z190-365(PD)
